name: 胡憲倫
objective:
學生將會學習從較宏觀的視野來認識屬於人文與社會層面的環境管理。課程將會透過系統思考及永續創新的角度，來反思地球的現在與未來；闡述新經濟時代的來臨與綠色資本主義的重要性及其四種策略，來緩解氣候變遷及全球暖化的趨勢，創造企業競爭優勢，並開創人類永續發展的新契機。
Students will be guided from a broader and global perspective to learning the social and human aspects of protecting the Earth. Lectures will cover systems thinking and its importance to Sustainable Development, Innovation and emerging technologies for sustainability, Natural Capitalism, and its strategies, and Circular Economy.
schedule:
Week 1 導論 - 資本主義與永續發展 (綠色資本主義 / 永續發展目標)
             Introduction- Capitalism and Sustainable Development/Natural Capitalism and Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)
Week 2 生物模擬－師法自然
Learning from the Nature- Biomimicry (Lecture by Ms. Suphichaya Suppipat) 
Week 3 永續創新及提昇資源生產力 Sustainable Innovation, Resource Productivity 
Week 4 服務與流動的經濟 (產品服務系統) 及循環經濟 Product Service System (PSS)& Circular Economy
Week 5 金字塔底層及包容性經濟 Bottom of the Pyramid (BOP) & Inclusive Business
Week 6  結語及分組報告 (Conclusion and Group Presentation)
materials:
1.　　Sachs, J.D. The Age of Sustainable Development, The Wylie Agency (UK), 2015 (周曉琪、羅耀宗譯，永續發展新紀元，天下文化，2017) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EadvEChBNUA
2.　　Lovins, A.B. Lovins, L.H. and P. Hawken, A Roadmap for Natural Capitalism, Harvard Business Review, May-June, 145-158, 1999
3.　　Senge et al., The Necessary Revolution- How Individuals and Organizations are Working Together to Create a Sustainable World, The Doubleday Publishing Group, 2008 (齊若蘭譯，Peter Senge 原著，必要的革命 - 個人與組織如何共創永續社會，天下文化，2010)
4.　　Papers assigned for the class

name: 曾昭衡
objective:
永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程依此宗旨討論土壤管理、有害物質處理與處置、水及廢水處理與管理；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are soil management, hazardous waste treatment and disposal and water and wastewater treatment and management. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed
schedule:
1. 優選工具簡介 Mathematic tools for system analysis
　　線性規劃
　　時間序列、啟發式演算法、類神經網路、灰色理論 / 模糊理論
　　賽局理論、小世界理論
2. Models of Growth and Decay 
　　Simple Logistic Model
　　Logistic Model with Carrying Capacity
　　Logistic Model with Carrying Capacity and Migration
3. Chaotic 混沌 Behavior (week 3 交 HW1)
　　Dynamics of species
　　Critical Reproduction Rate
　　Bifurcation
4. Examples of Chaotic behavior
　　Single Species System
　　Two Species Competition System
　　Two Species Predator-Prey System
5. Butterfly effect 蝴蝶效應. Deterministic or Random? (week 5 交 HW2)
6. Final Exam;
materials: handouts (PPT) @ 北科 i 學園 http://ischool.ntut.edu.tw

name: 楊任軒
objective:
Lectures will cover related knowledge of reaction engineering and reactor design in environmental engineering.

介紹反應工程與反應器設計之相關知識，以應用於環境工程相關研究，並擴展到實場應用。
schedule:
週次及對應主題如下 (並視上課情況適當調整)
第一週: 1. 反應工程與反應器設計簡介
第二週: 2. 溫度及壓力效應
第三週: 3. 競爭反應
第四週: 4. 理想及非理想反應器
第五週: 5. 流體 - 粒狀物及流體 - 流體反應
第六週: 6. 流體化床反應器
scorePolicy:
平時成績 (50%)
考試成績 (50%)
materials:
自製 PPT 簡報；Chemical Reaction Engineering, Octave Levenspiel;
Elements of Chemical Reaction Engineering, H. Scott Fogler
